notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A supercommentary on Abraham Ibn Ezra's commentary on the Pentateuch.

msItem.title: The aggadic commentary on the Pentateuch

collation.p: Quires of mostly 8 leaves each. Catchword on every verso.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi semi-cursive script, unpunctuated. Nisim Muri᾿el: inscribed on folio 3r.

history.provenance: Acquisition: M. Aschkenazi of Tunis: purchased from him on 01 August 1857, inscribed ([189v]).
